BodyCopy.Data: In the event that you need to return or exchange product, please contact Customer Service and note the following:
Upon our receipt of the returned product, we will replace or exchange the product or issue you a refund in the form of your original payment should you wish to return it.

ContentLinkExpanded.Heading2: Product in Exchange for a Contribution

BodyCopy.Data: Upon receipt of the returned product, we will replace or exchange the product.  Please note that due to current tax laws, contributions made to the ministry in exchange for a product are unable to be refunded.
